stories.fantasy_headline: Ocean Sages Discover Secret of Deep-Dwelling Beasts!
stories.fantasy_story: The Ocean Sages have finally understood why great sea beasts frequent the gloom-shrouded waters. It seems certain scale-fin fish, living in the abyssal depths by day, rise at night to feed. These fish form a crucial link, connecting the hidden depths with the sunlit surface realms for all creatures.

stories.fantasy_headline: Star-gazing Wizards Witness Ancient Celestial Bloom!
stories.fantasy_story: Cosmic Scholars have spied the most distant star's final radiance ever seen, from the very dawn of creation. An ethereal signal first hinted at the event, which was then confirmed by the Grand Orrery of Celestial Vision. This powerful artifact allowed them to isolate the magnificent blast from its faint star-island cluster.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Luminous Guild Unveils New Scrying Mirrors for Arcane Contests!
stories.fantasy_story: The Luminous Guild has revealed a stunning collection of scrying mirrors, just before the Grand Exhibition of Arcane Craft. These exquisite UltraGear evo mirrors boast unparalleled clarity and special vision-enhancing spells. They promise to make trials of skill more vivid and immersive for all who gaze upon them.
